1111001001100110 1101001111101110 1 -> sum: 1100011001010101, cout: 1
0100011000010111 0001110000001100 0 -> sum: 0110001000100011, cout: 0
0010001011101101 0001101011100100 1 -> sum: 0011110111010010, cout: 0
0100010011110000 1010110011101000 1 -> sum: 1111000111011001, cout: 0
0001101111111101 1000110011111000 0 -> sum: 1010100011110101, cout: 0
0100110111110100 0001100100001110 0 -> sum: 0110011100000010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
